desc: 150% boost to Atk, Def for first 4 turns, enormously boosts critical hit rate & boosts critical dmg

dictionary.lore: Many literary works collected by the Vriksha Duchy mention the legend of the Amenonuhoko. Eons ago, when Grand Gaia knew no heaven or earth, nor even the names of the gods, the light of a brilliant spirit from another world appeared in Grand Gaia. Using the Amenonuhoko it created various islands, and the humans that would encapsulate other spirits shortly after. This legend is based on a story from another world, however, and its degree of authenticity remains unknown.

name: Amenonuhoko
